display_long_description:
Welcome to the future of cricket. In this immersive Virtual cricket playground, you can bat in different match scenarios, chase down targets and be the master of your own stadium! 
You’re front and center in a true to life stadium with panoramic 360-degree views. World-class bowling, phenomenal fielding and a 100,000 roaring fans with just you to beat the opposition - Are you up for it? Of course you are, the virtual world is your oyster!
Features: 
•	360-degree immersive virtual environments
•	Various difficulty levels along with a Practise Mode to get you on your way
•	5 bowling options - Face Pacers, Leg Spinners, Off Spinners, Swing bowlers & Mystery spinners
•	Indian V20 League – Covering your favourite Indian Teams
•	International Tournaments – Choose your country and win the coveted global trophy
•	State of the art graphics & animation
•	Professional Commentary
